law.text: No portion of moneys appropriated for the Unit of the Civil Air Patrol established pursuant to KRS 36.230 shall be expended without the approval of the adjutant general nor shall they be expended for the purchase of uniforms for any member of the Civil Air Patrol.
law.history: Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 258, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1996.
